issues.description: The problem statement specifies a Java Bitmap implementation with an internal method `resize_buffer` declared `protected`, but the provided template and solution repositories contain only assembly code modules (e.g., fix_add.asm) with no Java classes or a `resize_buffer` method stub. Students will have no place to declare or implement the required protected method, causing major confusion.
issues.suggested_fix: Provide a Java template repository matching the problem description, including a `Bitmap` class with a protected `resize_buffer` method stub. Remove or segregate the unrelated assembly modules to avoid confusion.
